message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique and valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. Would you consider selling it to me for $180?
I understand that $180 is a bit tight for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $220.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could you possibly offer the product at $200?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $230.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. Given my budget constraints, would you consider offering the product at $210?
I'm getting closer to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $240.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. Considering my budget, could you possibly offer the product at $220?

I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price, Bob. I can offer you the product for $250, which is the lowest I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
